author: Manny E
title: A wonderful gem of a hotel with excellent staff
text:
We went on a couples city break to this hotel and we're really impressed with the friendliness and attention to detail of the staff.
Very close to the metro, this hotel is a short walk away from a main line station linking you with everything you could wish to see.
The rooms are small (as they are everywhere in central Paris) however they were finished to a high standard with the comfiest beds around. The showers are also worth a mention - lashings of hot water and real power!
The concierge was wonderful! We all speak a little childhood French but he was fantastic- even booking tickets for us and supplying maps to get about and explore Paris together.
We organised champagne upon arrival (birthday amongst us) and this was ready and chilled in our rooms when we arrived.
It's a beautiful hotel, our rooms even had balconies so we could sit and soak in the atmosphere around us. The staff also recommended restaurants in the local area and we were very happy with their suggestions.
It was a great break, made better by such attentive service and beautiful hotel.
